attributes.action: Set up a group of ordinary people to tell him on how people really see him and his government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are so many new laws to decrease the freedom of the individual being proposed and introduced. Some are so badly thought out it appears that Whitehall and No.10 are manned by a bunch of YES men.
A group of ordinary people, not affiliated to any political party, not wealthy, not having any particular axe to grind would be able to tell the PM what is right or wrong with the latest idea.
They would not have any influence with government decision making but could help the PM look like someone who has thought through a decision.
